name: Five Nights at Chairkea
description:
You have been a bad boy
You need to be punished
But I'm here to help you CLOSE THE DOOR
CHECK THE VENT
WATCH YOUR BACK
AND SURVIVE UNTIL 6 AM Release: Sept. 04, 2022

When you shop in Chairkea, you will immediately greet with our beautiful mimi-tronic receptionist, Tita Mimi, and the main star mimi-tronic of the Chairkea Ware Inc., the owner, the queen of Chairland, MimiChair!

Shop now and get a free Chibi Mimi plush!

This is a Five Nights at Freddy's style fan game made for Twitch Art Streamer, MimiChair for her birthday celebration.

DISCLAIMER:

  1. Five Nights at Chairkea is using older version of Unity 2020.1.6
  2. No networking libraries or packages are used, game is completely offline
  3. No Unity made packages were updated past their initial versions on 2020.1.6 build
